Convert 101 to decimal 5
Convert 1010101 to decimal 85
Convert 0101010 to decimal 42
Convert 11111111 to decimal 255
Convert 1100110011001101 to decimal 52,429
Convert 11111111111111111111 to decimal 1,048,575
Convert 111100001111 to decimal 3,855
Convert 100000000000 to decimal 2,048
Convert 101010111100110111101111 to decimal 11,259,375
Convert 542110 to binary 1000 0100 0101 1001 1110
Convert 8010 to binary  1 1111 0100 1010
Convert 1234510 to binary 1 0010 1101 0110 0100 1110
Convert 1510 to binary  101 1110 0110
Convert 6553510 to binary  110 0011 1111 1111 1010 0110
Convert 3276710 to binary  11 0001 1111 1111 1010 0110
